title: Judd Apatow On George Carlin’s Incredible Ability To Reinvent Himself
description:
Our friend Judd Apatow returns to The Late Show to chat with Stephen about the man he profiles in his new special, "George Carlin's American Dream," which is streaming now on HBO Max.
We want your feedback on The Late Show Pod Show with Stephen Colbert! Visit http://www.colbertlateshow.com/podsurvey to take a brief survey.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
